Take flight in Flappy Bird (Super), the addictive flying game with a new twist! Flap your way through endless pipes, and when things get toughâ€”touch the fire power-up to become invincible. Soar through obstacles, rack up points, and aim to beat your personal best, which updates in real-time in the bottom-left corner. How far can you go before crashing?

Real-Time Score Tracking: Keep an eye on your highest score as you play.
Endless Fun: Simple yet challenging mechanics that keep you coming back.
Instant Play: No downloads requiredâ€”play in your browser anytime!
Unblocked Version: Play at home, work, or school without restrictions.
